foo bar alondra_123FOOBAR 123foobar
'foo' 'b''ar' '''bar''' #10 #13#10 #$0d#$0A 'foo'^n'bar'
+ - * / ( )
= < > <= >= <>
:= [ ] . ^ @
.. , : ;
(* comment *)
{ comment }
ABSOLUTE and ARRAY begin CASE Const Div DO downto ELSE end FILE for
fOrWaRd function goto IF IN label mod nil NOT OF OR PACKED PROCEDURE
PROGRAM RECORD REPEAT SET SHL SHR THEN TO TYPE UNTIL VAR WHILE WITH XOR
   
END.
